directions: Combine corn, bell pepper, jalapeno, onion, lime juice, chili powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Stir until evenly combined.

Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add corn mixture and cook until onion has softened, about 6 minutes. Stir in black beans and cook for 2 minutes more. Remove from heat and sprinkle cilantro over the top.
ingredients: 4 ears corn, shucked and kernels removed
1 large jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
title: Southwestern Corn and Black Bean Skillet | Allrecipes
